ingredients: 3 lbs Brewers Choice Liquid Sorghum Extract (prior to boil)
3 lbs Brewers Choice Liquid Sorghum Extract (flameout)
1 pkg Safeale US05 Dried Ale Yeast
0.25 oz Yeast Nutrient pitched with yeast and very gently stir
Brewing notes: Converted from metric - measurements rounded/estimated
name: Golden Ale
